verbs.description: A new bombshell report [V: has] revealed that Swiss drug company Novartis paid President Donald Trump 's personal lawyer a total of $ 1.2 million to advise the company as to how the Trump administration might approach certain US healthcare policy matters , including the Affordable Care Act . "

"
